page.title: 10PUBS IN MONYASH
page.content: The{Hobbit Inn}is 366 years old.It used to be called{"The Bull's {Head".} The present landlord has lived at the pub for nearly 2 years.26 people can eat in the restaurant. Bar snacks are also served.There are 4 rooms for Bed and Breakfast. There are two deliveries each week: beer,soft drinks, crisps, etc.The pub opening times are 11.30a.m.-3.00p.m. and 6.30p.m._ 11.00p.m.The pub is much busier in the Summer when alot of tourists use it: walkers, campers,etc. The{Bull'i'Thorn}is 513 years old.There are 8 people working at the pub.The Bull'i'Thorn has 21 rooms:it offers bed and breakfast and serves bar snacks. The{Plough Inn}at Flagg is 185 years old.8 people work in the pub and it serves bar snacks and restaurant meals.
